member.name: IDropSourceNotify.DragEnterTarget
member.summary: OLE calls this method when the user drags the mouse cursor into a potential drop target window.
member.param: The window handle of the potential drop target window.
member.returns: This method returns S_OK on success.

member.name: IDropSourceNotify.DragLeaveTarget
member.summary: OLE calls this method when the user drags the mouse cursor out of a potential drop target window.
member.returns: This method returns S_OK on success.

member.name: IDropSourceNotify
member.summary: The IDropSourceNotify interface is implemented on an object to receive notifications from OLE when a user drags the mouse into or out of a potential drop target window.
